title: P&G Recalls Some Pantene, Aussie, Herbal Essences Dry Shampoos
sub_head: Voluntary recall, linked to benzene detected in aerosol propellant, also affects dry conditioners
body:
Procter & Gamble Co. issued a voluntary recall of a variety of aerosol haircare products, after benzene, a cancer-causing chemical, was detected in some.
The affected products include dry shampoos and dry conditioners from Pantene, Aussie and Herbal Essences, produced in the U.S.
